Title: South Korea Connected Healthcare Market Report 2022 to 2030
Content:
South Korea Connected Healthcare Market Analysis



$ 3999


The South Korean connected healthcare market is projected to grow from $969.62 Mn in 2022 to $7622.15 Mn by 2030, registering a CAGR of 29.4% during the forecast period of 2022 - 2030. The main factors driving the growth would be the growing geriatric population, high-tech culture, government support and the COVID-19 pandemic. The market is segmented by type, function and by application. Some of the major players include Samsung, SK Telecom, Hanwha Group, Oracle, Philips Healthcare and GE Healthcare.
